summary: Based on the novel by Ernest Hemingway. Santiago goes out on his usual fishing trip and makes a huge catch, the biggest of his life. Then a shark attacks and tries to steal his catch. ... See full summary »
cast: Anthony Quinn|Gary Cole|Patricia Clarkson|Joe Santos|Valentina Quinn|Francesco Quinn|Paul Calderon|Sully Diaz|Jamie Tirelli|Raúl Dávila|James McDaniel|Rene Rivera|Steven Rodriquez|Manuel E. Santiago|Alexis Cruz
title: El viejo y el mar
